text: Mark W. Moses (born February 24, 1958) is an American actor. He is known for his roles of Paul Young on Desperate Housewives and Herman "Duck" Phillips on the AMC series Mad Men. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Actors from Evanston, Illinois
title: Mark Moses
